rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains explicit calming ('will not enter the food system'), but no high-potency language for Alarmist.
The segment discusses future/planned actions ('will be culled', 'will not enter'), using a containment verb excluded for Q3.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports action taken (culling) and a bare negation ('will not enter the food system').
